Key Match Events: Jordan Ayew scored a late winner for Ghana in their 2-1 victory over Mali
Ernest Nuamah brought parity for the Black Stars in the game with a cross from Salis Samed
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Otto Addo later brought on Jordan Ayew, and the substitute became the game-changer
Others: The match was played at the Stade du 26 Mars in Bamako on Thursday, June 6, 2024
Ghana won the match 2-1 against Mali in the 2026 FIFA World Cup qualifiers
